title: Quarkus 2.10.3.Final released - Fixes CVE-2022-2466
content: 2.10.0.CR1 introduced a major security issue known as CVE-2022-2466 in the SmallRye GraphQL server extension and all the 2.10.x releases are affected (together with 2.11.0.CR1). 2.10.3.Final fixes it and the fix will also be included in the upcoming 2.11.0.Final. You are only affected by this issue if you are exposing...
